alert.note: Alert for Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 7:32AM CDT until July 24 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 732 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Weston, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leavenworth, Platte City, Weston, Camden Point and Tracy. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 20 and 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
